activities: KBM Group,LLC enables marketers to engage relevantly with their customers and prospects in terms of highly focused offers and individually meaningful marketing messages via preferred methods of communication – email, Internet, smart phone.  Using analytics, modeling, and other modern marketing techniques, KBM Group processes customer intelligence data for our clients to inform and optimize their marketing campaigns. The information KBM Group receives and houses on behalf of its clients continues to be owned and controlled by the respective client.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, client and customer data
